name: Yotogimichi
description:
Let's spend the summer country town leisurely with my sister!
You can go to various places such as mountains, rivers, vacant lots, candy stores, and bathhouses.
Play part-time jobs, play games, eat rice and snacks.
By taking a walk, you can deepen exchanges with your sister and get money and items.
The places and actions you can go to will gradually increase.​
